name: Clamping Devices
description: Clamping devices are essential woodworking tools used to hold two or more pieces of wood tightly together during assembly or while glue is drying. These tools come in various forms, including bar clamps, pipe clamps, and C-clamps, each designed for specific applications and sizes of materials. Clamping devices ensure precision and stability, allowing woodworkers to achieve clean joints and secure fittings.
